testcase.name: should create a new article and validate the article appears in the feed
should edit an article and validate the article text has updated
should update the status headline and verify the change
should count the number of followed users
should Add the user "Follower" to the list of followed users and verify the count increases by one
should Remove the user "Follower" from the list of followed users and verify the count decreases by one
should Search for Only One Article Like This and verify only one article shows and verify the author
should Navigate to the profile view Update the users email and verify
should Navigate to the profile view Update the users zipcode and verify
should Navigate to the profile view Update the users password and verify
